## Quarto

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(pander)
diamonds |> slice(1:4) |> select(clarity, table, price) |>
  pander()
```

## Bullets

```{r}
#| echo: false
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = color, y = price)) +
  geom_violin(colour = "skyblue4", fill = "skyblue1") 
```

## Price and Clarity

```{r}
#| echo: false
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) +
  geom_violin(colour = "skyblue4", fill = "skyblue1") 
```
